contents.text: Thank you for calling Thrive Global in San Francisco, where we end stress and burnout with science-based well-being solutions.
To learn about our individual well-being resources and digital products, press 1.
To subscribe to Thrive Global's personal resilience programs, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our subscription team.

navigationGoals: I want to subscribe to a personal resilience program for my own well-being.
I want to subscribe to your personal resilience program to help me manage stress and burnout.
I’d like to subscribe to the personal resilience program and enable its analytics dashboard.
I need help signing up for your personal resilience subscription program.
Enroll in a personal resilience program to better manage my physics coursework and research stress.

contents.text: To inquire about our mental health and mindfulness course offerings, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our course enrollment specialists.

navigationGoals: I’d like to enroll in a mental health and mindfulness course to better manage stress.
I’d like information on your mental health and mindfulness courses and how I can enroll.
I want to enroll in your mental health and mindfulness online course and get the curriculum details.
I’d like information on your mental health and mindfulness courses and how to enroll.
Get details on your mental health and mindfulness courses tailored for students.

contents.text: For corporate and enterprise solutions to enhance employee performance, press 2.
To discuss customized corporate training and workshops, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our corporate training team.

navigationGoals: I need details on customized corporate training workshops for my team.
I need details on customized corporate training workshops to improve my team’s performance.
I’d like to discuss designing a customized corporate well-being workshop for our team.
I want to arrange customized corporate well-being workshops for our organization.
Arrange a customized stress-management workshop for my physics lab group.

contents.text: To speak with a consulting representative about enterprise wellness solutions, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our corporate consulting specialists.

navigationGoals: I want to discuss enterprise wellness consulting solutions for my company.
I want to speak with a consultant about enterprise wellness and employee resilience solutions.
I want to consult about integrating enterprise wellness solutions into our organization.
I’d like to speak with a consultant about your enterprise wellness solutions.
Speak with a consultant about enterprise-level wellness solutions for our physics department.
